item.description:
Inviting friends, & members of different groups to enjoy conversations at a chocolate cafe! Located "in historic Old Wethersfield in a renovated 1872 Railroad Depot." Never been here but it sounds good. Coffee, selection of chocolates, smoothies, pastry, sandwiches, free WIFI. Menu and yummy pics on website.

Event on if 5+ people attend. For 1st few people who rsvp Yes by Thurs, I might be able to get coupons for Buy 1 Get 1 free anything from affiliate points I earned elsewhere.

Sat it closes 5pm, so don't miss it! Might do another fun activity afterwards.

narcissuschocolatecafe.com
http://www.narcissusc...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the short Asian, wearing BRIGHT blue tee w/possibly dark pleather jacket
item.name: Narcissus Chocolate Cafe Flag Day Weekend
